JOB DESCRIPTION: Responsibilities:    Participate in the development and maintenance of AACER with coding, testing, and deployment.   Estimate assigned work effort and be accountable for deliverables and completion dates.   Provide analysis, recommendations, and solutions to improve performance, security, and scalability of software and services.   Contribute to our technical evolution by sharing of business and technology knowledge.   Contribute to the enhancement of our Continuous Integration, Continuous Deployment and development lifecycle.   Troubleshooting and product bug correction.      Qualifications (Must Have):    Strong ability to communicate in English both in written and verbal forms.   Degree or Diploma in Computer Science or equivalent.   Exceptional interpersonal and organizational skills to effectively collaborate with a multifunctional team.   Understanding of software development life-cycle like Agile.   6+ years of experience with .NET and C#.   6+ years of experience with ASP.NET.   6+ years of experience with HTML and CSS.   2+ years of experience with React JS or UI Framework.   4+ years of experience with SQL.   Hands on experience with Git.   . Strong understanding of TFS   Strong understanding of JSON and RESTful APIs.        Qualifications (Nice to Have):    Experience with Azure.   Experience with .Net Core, and ASP.NETCore.   Experience with Azure DevOps (VSTS).
